definition: oil/fat/grease/petroleum/to apply tung oil, paint or varnish/oily/greasy/glib/cunning

sentences.english: Coal tar has a strong smell and can stain clothing.
sentences.chinese: 煤焦油有很强烈的气味，并且会染污衣服。

sentences.english: They will report on the experiments with coal tar.
sentences.chinese: 他们将汇报煤焦油的试验情况。

sentences.english: My anchor's cable is not tarred.
sentences.chinese: 我的锚链是不涂焦油的。

sentences.english: North Carolina is the Tar Heel State.
sentences.chinese: 北卡罗莱纳则被称为“焦油脚后根之州”。

sentences.english: Use of smokeless tobacco also raises the risk.
sentences.chinese: 即使吸食低焦油的烟草也同样会提高患病风险。

sentences.english: Time sure does fly when you are tarring over your lungs.
sentences.chinese: 当你肺里的焦油量逐渐增多，时间也在不断飞逝。

sentences.english: Coal tar has been a historic contribution to modern organic chemical industry.
sentences.chinese: 煤焦油曾为近代有机化工作出了历史性贡献。

sentences.english: Besides, the development mode of coal tar enterprises was also discussed.
sentences.chinese: 此外还讨论了煤焦油加工企业的发展模式。

sentences.english: Thus, new technologies were suggested for coal tar processing to extract all kinds of valuable chemica…
sentences.chinese: 最后对我国煤焦油加工未来的发展提出了若干建议。

sentences.english: Any remaining tar is removed by passing the gas through an electrostatic precipitator .
sentences.chinese: 将煤气通过静电沉淀器以除去残余的煤焦油。

sentences.english: Harris is chief curator at the Page Museum, which houses treasures from the tar pits.
sentences.chinese: 培基博物馆内收藏着从焦油坑里挖掘到的珍宝。

sentences.english: Tar balls continue to wash up on beaches.
sentences.chinese: 焦油球继续被冲刷到沙滩上。

sentences.english: The invention relates to an electrostatic dust and tar removing unit and the anhydrous process thereof.
sentences.chinese: 本发明涉及一种静电除尘除焦油装置及其无水工艺。

sentences.english: Factors influencing the properties of the coal tar enamels were discussed.
sentences.chinese: 讨论了影响煤焦油磁漆性能的因素。

sentences.english: However, the gas containing tar from updraft gasifier can be used for direct burning.
sentences.chinese: 但是，载有上升气流天然气气化焦油可用于直接燃烧。

sentences.english: The thermal decomposed gases and water-containing tar may be used as fuel to offer heat for the thermal process.
sentences.chinese: 热解气体和焦油可作燃料使用为热解提供热量。

definition: variant of 菸鹼|菸碱[yan1 jian3]/nicotine
